name: Herschel Jones Marketing Service, Inc., Appellant, v. Stotz
name_abbreviation: Herschel Jones Marketing Service, Inc. v. Stotz

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and McBbide, JJ.'
parties: Herschel Jones Marketing Service, Inc., Appellant, v. Stotz.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
The Court being evenly divided, the judgment is affirmed.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: W. Hamlin Neely, with him Snyder, Wert, Wilcox, Frederick & Doll, for appellant.
Robert H. Jordan, with him Edwin K. Kline, Jr., and Kline, Jordan & Backenstoe, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Herschel Jones Marketing Service, Inc., Appellant, v. Stotz.
Argued January 13, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and McBbide, JJ.'
reargument refused May 22, 1959.
W. Hamlin Neely, with him Snyder, Wert, Wilcox, Frederick & Doll, for appellant.
Robert H. Jordan, with him Edwin K. Kline, Jr., and Kline, Jordan & Backenstoe, for appellee.
March 25, 1959:
